channel.title: Having a conversation with NPC's

item.title: Having a conversation with NPC's
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“pkn00b, post:7, topic:279727”][quote author=georges link=topic=369113.msg2794597#msg2794597 date=1242992250]

Ohh quests… Sorry can’t help you

Cuz i hate quests , not so many ppl likes them sorry k

Georgio

Ok, let’s say this is not a quest.
How do I have a conversation with an NPC?

maybe easy it always works with me

Search in ur client.java case 126 , or case 80

if u find it wil say

Case 80;( u can change the 80 ) Talk("blablablatext, NPCID") Break;
Thts what i use :s?

and some more i don’t rlly know somthing about those things :s

Georgio soz

[/quote]

That is wrong.
Just look at the code at the top.[/quote]

I don’t know how to help you , i hate quests , and making npc talk + portals :s

Georgio

Read full topic

item.title: Having a conversation with NPC's
item.dc:creator: @pkn00b pkn00b
item.description:
@pkn00b wrote:

Well, I’m making a quest and I want to talk with NPCs just like in runescape.
This is all the code I got.

if(NPCID == 1069) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(1069), 4884); sendFrame126("I need a new defender. Can you help me?", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(1069, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

If I want to make a longer conversation between he and I, how do I do that?

pkn00b

Read full topic
